svg.text: Parachains as Specialized, Interoperable State Machines

g.text: Provides finality for ALL connected parachains
Optimized for: NFTs, Fast TPS, Assets
Parachains purchase coretime using DOT tokens
• Relay Chain validators secure ALL parachains
• No independent NPoS or consensus per parachain
Trade-off: Robust security vs. ceded finality control

• If Relay Chain reverts → All parachains revert
Ensures global consistency across state machines
• Each parachain optimized for specific use cases
XCM enables seamless communication between specialized chains

svg.text: Application-Specific Optimization • Independent Native Tokens • Custom Governance • Shared Security • Global Finality
